data.title: Manual of Village Development Committee (VDC)
meta_keywords: one stop source of government information
data.meta_description: National Portal of India provides a single-window access to information and services that are electronically delivered from all Government Departments, Institutions and Organizations. It has been a popular source of information to a wide range of stakeholders - from citizens, to government, business and Indian Diasporas. It is a gateway to access Indian Government websites at Centre, State and District levels.
data.text:
The Sidhi district of Madhya Pradesh is a repository of natural, historical and cultural history and is known for luxuriant natural resources with rivers. Users can find information about the administrative structure of the district and Zila Panchayat. Details of blocks and population of Sidhi district are provided. Users can access links of MP Online, MP Portal and districts of MP etc. One can also check examination results.

Users can find information related to the Morena district of Madhya Pradesh. Get information about the Shanichara temple, Archaeological Museum and Educational Avenues etc. Information on tourism is also given. Important links are also provided for related information for users.

Tribal Research and Development Institute of Bhopal is premier organization in Madhya Pradesh (MP) engaged in tribal research and survey. Information about the institute, its administrative structure, objectives, activities and library are given. Users can find details of research activities of the institute such as survey, evaluation, impact assessment, documentation of tribal culture, research etc.

Information about Kalidas Academy in Ujjain district of Madhya Pradesh is given. Users can get details about the academy, its history, objectives setting, layout and activities. Details related to projects initiated by the academy such as critical edition and translation of natya shastra, acharyakula, maokhika parampara (Oral Tradition), etc. are given. Information about academyâ€™s library, seminars, lecturers and publications and future plans...

Detailed information about the High Court of Madhya Pradesh is provided. Users can find information related to the Chief Justice, judges, former judges, legal services and registry office etc. One can also access cause lists, judgements, orders, notifications and check the status of pending cases in the court. Details of vacancies, transfers, postings and promotions etc. are also available. Information about the Benches of the court is also...

Detailed information about the Department of Tribal Development of Madhya Pradesh is given. Users can find information pertaining to the welfare schemes for tribals, institutions, educational facilities and scholarships etc. Details of hostels, training programmes and schools for tribals are given.

Information on the Directorate of Sericulture of Madhya Pradesh is given. Users can get detailed information on objectives, organisation, schemes, budget, activities of the Directorate. Details of sericulture development in the state are available. Information on Mulberry and Tussar Silk Centres is also given.

Users can get information about the Board of Secondary Education of Madhya Pradesh. Details of examination, time table, recognized schools and scholarship etc. are available.

Information about agricultural engineering is given by Department of Farmer Welfare and Agriculture Development of Madhya Pradesh. Users can get details related to Directorate of Agricultural Engineering, objectives, deep ploughing, land levelling, yield testing, subsidy programme, etc. Information on machines located at tractor units, hiring rates and subsidy pattern on improved agricultural implements.

Madhya Pradesh Warehousing and Logistics Corporation (MPWLC) is responsible for scientific storage of agriculture and minors forest produce, seeds, manures, fertilizers, agricultural implements and notified commodities. Users can access information about storage facilities, licence for warehousing, capacity, utiltisation, tariff, rebate, quality measures, etc. Details on district wise and region wise warehouses are given.

Get information about the National Law Institute University of Bhopal. Information related to admission, administration, academics, projects, students and faculty etc. are available. Users can also get details pertaining to internships, facilities, results and students etc.

Get information about Madhya Pradesh state. Find details about the history, profile, tourism, districts, public enterprises and government departments of the state. Links are provided for citizen's services such as passport enquiry, pension helpline, tourist information, weather report, consumer welfare, citizen's charter, tax rates, forms, air and rail travel services etc. Users can also go through associate websites of state for education,...

Information about Madhya Pradesh State Seed Certification Agency is given. Users can get details related to seed certification, seed production programme, seed production techniques, availability of seeds, etc. Information about eligibility of crop varieties for certification, field inspection, tagging, sealing, etc. is given. List of seed processing centres is also available.
